item.title: Data Wrangling using Tidyverse
item.description: Import the Hotels.cvs file library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.3 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.1.1 v dplyr 1.0.6 ## v tidyr 1.1.3 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.4.0 v forcats 0.5.1 ## -- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() hotels <- read_csv("hotels.csv") ## ## -- Column specification -------------------------------------------------------- ## cols( ## .
